content.prompt: Which of the following events best represents a continuity of the sentiments expressed by Senator Calhoun in the speech?

choices.label: The United States rejection of membership in the League of Nations
Support for assimilationist policies in the 1880s and 1890s
The Great Migration of African Americans out of the South in the 1910s

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
